mapper.select: select referUserId from plans where status != 'NOT_OPEN' group by referUserId order by max(createdAt) desc
select id, title, detail, status, approval, referCategoryId, referTagId, referUserId, createdAt from plans where referUserId = #{referUserId} order by createdAt desc
mapper.insert: insert into plans( id, title, detail, status, approval, referCategoryId, referTagId, referUserId, createdAt ) values( #{id}, #{title}, #{detail}, #{status}, #{approval}, #{referCategoryId}, #{referTagId}, #{referUserId}, #{createdAt} )
